description:
See more in this series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItSSUpA-DskfKKKrQ_LQYwP - A recent FCC filing reveals some frustration over the slow pace of the ATSC 3.0 emergency alert system rollout. See more commentary: http://lon.tv/ww and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:49 - AWARN Background
02:15 - Awarn's FCC Filing and Statement
03:57 - No ATSC 3.0 Alerts Currently?
04:34 - ATSC 3.0's Superior Emergency Alert Technology
07:04 - Sample ATSC 3.0 Alerts
07:55 - Will encryption create an disparity in emergency notifications?
11:24 - Conclusion

title: ATSC 3.0 Emergency Alerts In Flux - Encryption was a higher priority?
